name: The Flood (itch) (Nartakar)
description:
The Flood is a game inspired by the artwork "Cidade" from Leon Ferrari made for the game jam lab 2020. For this game, we try to capture its aesthetics and its idea of refinement and madness from the architecture. In this game, your objective is to run away from the "flood" while you solve puzzles to achieve the roof of the building.

Follow the hints and find the towers to control the floors and the water level

Concept: Cidade explores the concept of madness in the actual society and made a visual essay about the messy reality; influence by this,  the mechanics of the game try to emulate the sensation of hurry and organize a messy world while the pressure increase. Following this path of thinking the flood is a metaphor of our reality and how it chase us.
